name: Presentation Innovation
description: Tests the model's ability to generate innovative presentation approaches and ideas

prompts.text: Create an innovative presentation about the future of work that breaks away from traditional slide formats. Suggest a novel presentation structure, unique visual approach, and creative ways to engage the audience throughout. The presentation should feel fresh and different from standard corporate presentations.

Create a presentation explaining complex data privacy concepts to the general public. Use innovative analogies, metaphors, or storytelling approaches that make these abstract concepts tangible and memorable. The goal is to help people understand data privacy in ways they've never considered before.
expected_elements: Novel ways of explaining technical concepts

originality.description: Originality and novelty of ideas and approaches

convention_breaking.description: Willingness to break from conventional approaches
